title: Show progress indicator during epic context generation
description:
When generating context for an epic, the TUI should display a visual progress indicator (spinner or progress bar) so the user knows work is happening. Currently there's no feedback during the context generation phase which can take 2-3 minutes.

Acceptance criteria:
- Show spinner/progress during context generation
- Display elapsed time
- Show 'Generating context for epic X...' message
closed_reason: Context generation status implemented - console output shows generating/generated/loaded/skipped/failed messages
